MathJax setup

24 Apr 2020

MathJax renders LaTeX to CSS/webfonts/SVG for high quality web-typography. Here’s an inline equation, \(|\Phi^+\rangle = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} (|0\rangle_A \otimes |0\rangle_B + |1\rangle_A \otimes |1\rangle_B)\), and here’s a display-style equation:

\[R_{\mu\nu} - \frac{1}{2}Rg_{\mu\nu} + \Lambda g_{\mu\nu} = \frac{8\pi G}{c^4}T_{\mu\nu}.\]
